feed.title: PyPose Website
feed.subtitle: PyPose is to connect classic robotics with modern learning methods.

entry.title: Mapillary Research: Seamless Scene Segmentation and In-Place Activated BatchNorm

link.title: Mapillary Research: Seamless Scene Segmentation and In-Place Activated BatchNorm

entry.content: With roads in developed countries like the US changing up to 15% annually, Mapillary addresses a growing demand for keeping maps updated by combining images from any camera into a 3D visualization of the world. Mapillary’s independent and collaborative approach enables anyone to collect, share, and use street-level images for improving maps, developing cities, and advancing the automotive industry.
entry.summary: With roads in developed countries like the US changing up to 15% annually, Mapillary addresses a growing demand for keeping maps updated by combining images from any camera into a 3D visualization of the world. Mapillary’s independent and collaborative approach enables anyone to collect, share, and use street-level images for improving maps, developing cities, and advancing the automotive industry.

entry.title: PyTorch Adds New Ecosystem Projects for Encrypted AI and Quantum Computing, Expands PyTorch Hub

link.title: PyTorch Adds New Ecosystem Projects for Encrypted AI and Quantum Computing, Expands PyTorch Hub

entry.content: The PyTorch ecosystem includes projects, tools, models and libraries from a broad community of researchers in academia and industry, application developers, and ML engineers. The goal of this ecosystem is to support, accelerate, and aid in your exploration with PyTorch and help you push the state of the art, no matter what field you are exploring. Similarly, we are expanding the recently launched PyTorch Hub to further help you discover and reproduce the latest research.
entry.summary: The PyTorch ecosystem includes projects, tools, models and libraries from a broad community of researchers in academia and industry, application developers, and ML engineers. Similarly, we are expanding the recently launched PyTorch Hub to further help you discover and reproduce the latest research.
